|  [getStatusBySystem(name)](./sfapi.statusservice.getstatusbysystem.md) |  | <p>Read Status Get the status of a specific NERSC system.</p><p>- \*\*name\*\*: the name of the NERSC resource to query</p><p>Return values for \*\*status\*\* are:</p><p>- \*\*"active"\*\*: system is fully functional - \*\*"degraded"\*\*: system functional but possibly with degraded performance - \*\*"unavailable"\*\*: system is down, e.g. during a maintenance - \*\*"other"\*\*: status undefined (rare)</p> |
